compatibility.notes: OLDAP-1.2 is a permissive license that allows for broad compatibility with other permissive licenses. However, it is incompatible with copyleft licenses that impose stricter requirements.

key_requirements: Provide a prominent notice in modified files.
Include original copyright notices when redistributing.
Make modifications available under specified conditions.
license.name: OLDAP-1.2
obligations: Duplicate all original copyright notices and associated disclaimers when distributing verbatim copies.
Insert a prominent notice in each changed file stating how and when it was changed if modifications are made.
Make modifications Freely Available or allow the Copyright Holder to include them in the Standard Version.
